column6: "YOU SAY YOU WANT A REVOLUTION," PART THREE Swanky new Corporate Deadpool continues his makeover of the Krook Home World, turning it into a modern resort planet. Unfortunately, the Omega Confederation hired The Deadpool Corps to put down the rebels, not diversify them, so they cook up a little surprise for the rogue merc.  Meanwhile, not all of the Krook are happy with Deadpool's changes, and the Krook King starts a guerrilla war of his own, leading to a split within the Deadpool Corps itself.  The key question burning in everyone's mind ... which side will Dogpool be on? 32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
